full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement [Electric Vehicles' Batteries Cycler]

#### Title
*RFP: Electric Vehicles' Batteries Cycler*

#### Reference Number
WS3606176926-Doc3609777977

#### Tender Status
The tender is *Expired*.

#### Procurement Details
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Provement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Boucherville, Quebec, Canada

#### Notice Details
*   **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13999884?extsite=MTM5OTk4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13999884?extsite=MTM5OTk4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   **Publication Date**: September 2, 2022
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Overview
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking to acquire and deliver an Electric Vehicle (EV) Batteries Cycler for its Boucherville site in Quebec, Canada. The procurement of the EV Batteries Cycler will be based on competitive bidding, with the selected bidder being the lowest-priced offer.

#### Tender Closures
The closing time for the tender was initially ambiguous. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the latest on September 27, 2022, at 2 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Any bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### Additional Information
*   **G/SIN**: None
*   **UNSPSC**: 41113600 (Electrical Measuring and Testing Equipment and Accessories)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contact Information
*   **Contact Name**: Alina Cocieru, SPAC/PSPC
*   **Contact Email**: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase
